text:
At the moment the 'alt' tag attribute doesn't show up when editing an image's
properties. Since 'alt' attributes are quire important in terms of accessibility
they should be editable. If the 'title' attribute does indeed populate the 'alt'
attribute then this should be made clearer.

Alt text is a text alternative to an images whereas title attribute is more
useful as a sort of 'tooltip'
creator: ps@nomensa.com
